message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic product that I believe will be incredibly valuable for you. Given its potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,400,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so feel free to share your thoughts.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe this price is more in line with the product's value to me.

Bob, thanks for your response. I understand your perspective on the value, but I believe my initial offer is closer to reflecting the true worth of this product and its potential benefits for you.  Would you consider $1,300,000?

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not convinced that $1,300,000 is the right price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering $1,250,000. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the product's value to me.
